pageContext.claim: “The Democrats are pushing for Universal HealthCare while thousands of people are marching in the UK because their U system is going broke and not working. Dems want to greatly raise taxes for really bad and non-personal medical care. No thanks!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump got this backwards. The marchers in the United Kingdom were not protesting the health care system but instead were complaining about austerity measures imposed by the government.
